Text: RECount us in and thanks Lawrence J Pope Division Vice President Human Resources Halliburton ESG W M Original Message From Heintzelman Pete mailtoPeter NRONcom Sent Thursday September PM To Ward Kim S Houston Cc Lawrence Pope Email Subject RE We are in PJH Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday September PM To Heintzelman Pete Subject I definitely have four tickets for Tuesdays baseball game against the Giants I hope you are still in and please tell Lawrence that he and Cher can have the other two tix K This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
